rows.label: tev068401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gu Ladha what she is doing here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gu Ladha if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Gu Ladha about the xenoforms living in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Gu Ladha about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Gu Ladha about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0001
rows.name:
A great Wrothian sage once spent a thousand days
secluded atop a steep mountain, seeing no one until he
attained enlightenment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0002
rows.name:
I seek to follow his example and remain here to face
my own weakness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Do not worry—I promise to keep one eye open for you
in case enemies breach your walls. In the meantime,
leave me be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0008
rows.name:
How can you expect me to share my troubles with a
human such as you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0009
rows.name: I cannot even speak of them with my own captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0010
rows.name:
But then again, perhaps an outsider is just the person
to listen to me without judging...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Forgive me. Might you lend me an ear sometime,
once I work up the courage? I could use your counsel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0012
rows.name:
If I am to live as a Wrothian, there are things about
myself that I must learn to change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Unlike the Ganglion, you humans seek to meet other
alien races with diplomacy, not violence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0018
rows.name:
I admire this compassionate, bloodless approach—
though I see it does not always work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0019
rows.name:
The Ma-non, for example, were here before us,
and still they meet with prejudice and abuse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0020
rows.name: Some, I am told, have even met with death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0021
rows.name:
So yes, the path you have chosen is not easy—but I
still wish you luck. Let them call me un-Wrothian for
saying it, but fighting is not the only solution for things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0026
rows.name:
My primary job now is to negotiate with Percilla of the
provisional government.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0027
rows.name:
She is a wise woman, and thus far the negotiations
have gone well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0028
rows.name:
If only she would stop calling my ears cute and trying
to touch them! Rrrrrr...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0029
rows.name:
Still, my talks with her have made New LA's present
situation much clearer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0030
rows.name:
I thank you, friend, for your sound advice.
I am very glad I took it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0035
rows.name:
In my battles with you, I was able to confront my
weakness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0036
rows.name:
I learned to focus and gained the courage to attempt
Skell training, which is something I had been avoiding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0037
rows.name:
No longer shall I be a burden to my kinsmen on the
field of battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Thank you. I will keep at my training so I can be more
like Go Rogan, striking down myriad foes and doing
my duty to the prince.[ST:wait ]
